medical_history.chief_complaint: Chronic cough, wheezing, and progressively worsening dyspnea.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient's symptoms of chronic cough, wheezing, and dyspnea worsened progressively over time. The lung masses increased in size over 2 years, with stability in other nodules.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Known kaolin pneumoconiosis and secondary pulmonary fibrosis.
medical_history.family_history: One brother with lung cancer and one with head and neck cancer.
medical_history.social_history: Lifetime nonsmoker but exposed to second-hand smoke.
